name: Time Wizard Battle
description:
This is team 13's submission for the Buddy Up Jam, spring of '22! You are playing as a time wizard, who is chasing an evil time witch who has used time paradox in order to make an infinite number of herself. It is your job to hunt down her copies and destroy them with powerful magics! But be careful, as she can only be attacked when she is charging her own attack!

The time period will change every 1000 years!
